comments.body:
Fixed in trunk and 7.0.x and will be included in 7.0.21 onwards.

I do not plan to back-port this to 6.0.x or 5.5.x.

description:
Jasper output the message of compiling error using LF(\n) on ANY OS.
This cannot be correctly displayed with Windows notepad.

I think the line feed code along OS would be better, though I know other text 
editor solves this.
summary: Jasper output the message of compiling error using LF(\n) on ANY OS.
